conbody.p: You can configure the header information needed for sending the RESTful request object. By default, the Content-Type value of Header is generated automatically based on the HTTP Body. You can also select headers from the list of suggested options (by double-clicking on the Name cell) or enter another header of your interest. Refer to Supported HTTP Headers for more details.

Starting from version 7.2.5, Katalon Studio supports disabling specifying the content type of HTTP Header based on HTTP Body automatically. This allows users to configure content types for HTTP Header, and Body separately.
